Articles.Content:
Well, I made a report on my last mission - delivering and testing a mobile lab on the Mun.

Imgur provides good way of sharing such a thing, so I used it.

Please note, there is a backstory. It may contain witty humor, not-so-witty humor, some in-jokes and other stuff. Do not get offended by anything of that, that's only a story. All pictures which contain story parts are marked with (LOG) tag. I am assuming that this is more like voice log, Star Trek style.

I would suggest you to view the album on Imgur itself, because it is showing log entries much better.

So, let the story begin!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Enjoy, and thank you for your time.
I really wish I would have thought of this when I was playing career mode! An excellent little rover, and a fun story as well!
